subServ.name: Storytelling
subServ.desc: Anyone can string sounds together; turning them into a story is a whole other ballgame. We're here to make sure your projects always sound like a happy ending

subServ.name: TV-Digital-Radio-Podcast
subServ.desc: On ground, at sea, ON AIR, ON LINE. No matter the medium, we can tackle any project that involves an audio track. As long as it's not on mute

subServ.name: Voice Talents
subServ.desc: Even the best story can turn into a nightmare if the wrong voice is narrating. Thanks to a network made of the best voices around, every project of yours will sound like a dream

subServ.name: Composition
subServ.desc: Can't find a tune that suits your vibe anywhere in the world? No problem: we'll whip up a fresh one just for you

subServ.name: Tailor-Made Production
subServ.desc: 4 minutes, 60", 30", 12 milliseconds. Any piece will be custom-crafted to fit your project's needs.

subServ.name: Network of Artists, DJs and Producers
subServ.desc: Got a crush on an artist and want their song just for you? Our TOP SECRET directory is loaded with TOP CONTACTS always ready to create

subServ.name: Finding the Perfect Sound
subServ.desc: Got a project but no clue how it should sound? Well, we've got you covered!

subServ.name: Synchronisation
subServ.desc: No one likes being offbeat, especially when it comes to music. We're here to make sure every element of your project is perfectly in sync

subServ.name: Negotiation
subServ.desc: Music is great until you start talking about rights. We're here to ensure that every party involved is always protected, happily ever after
